p: No serious adverse events were associated with convalescent plasma treatment. 4, 5, 31 The most commonly reported mild adverse event was a brief “chill” reaction with a transient hyperpyrexia after the convalescent plasma transfusion. Few patients develop transfusion‐related adverse events such as phlebitis, generalized jaundice, or anaphylaxis. 24 A case report raised an association between transfusion‐related acute lung injury and convalescent plasma. 32
